General.Name: Coastal Greenland Limited
General.Description: Coastal Greenland Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the development of properties for sale in the People?s Republic of China. The company operates through Property Development, Property Investment, Property Management, Project Management, and Project Investment Services segments. It also invests in commercial and residential properties for rental potential and/or for capital appreciation; manages properties; and provides project management services, as well as investment services in relation to investment in and sale of property development/land development projects. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.
